title: Track Awesome Dev Fun Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Dev Fun (mislavcimpersak/awesome-dev-fun) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome fun libs/packages/languages that have no real purpose but to make a developer chuckle.

items.title: Awesome Dev Fun Updates on Jul 07, 2025
items.content_text:
### Python

*   [gremllm (‚≠ê564)](https://github.com/awwaiid/gremllm) - Always a good idea to add gremlins to your code in a modern fashion.
*   [Yell at the clouds MCP server (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/Tylersuard/yell_at_the_clouds_MCP_server) - Have suppressed rage? Want to let it out by screaming at the sky? Have your AI agent tell someone to do it for you!
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Dev Fun Updates on Jul 23, 2020
items.content_text:
### Golang

*   [codeometer (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/rafael-santiago/codeometer) - It measures your code in real world units of measurement also comparing the evaluated distance to famous places and monuments. Codeometer supports plain code files, zipped files and remote git repos. Doing all stuff as a straightforward command line tool or as a web tool through its embedded httpd (tls supported).
items.content_html:
Golang

  • codeometer (‚≠ê8) - It measures your code in real world units of measurement also comparing the evaluated distance to famous places and monuments. Codeometer supports plain code files, zipped files and remote git repos. Doing all stuff as a straightforward command line tool or as a web tool through its embedded httpd (tls supported).

items.content_text:
### Android

*   [Mindf@\*k Keyboard (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/terriblehackskeyboard/keyboard) - Terrible terrible soft-keyboard that randomises keys on every press.

### JavaScript

*   [Fapfap.js](http://fapfapjs.io) - Handcrafted JavaScript framework for DIY enthusiasts.
*   [FuckitJS (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/mattdiamond/fuckitjs) - JavaScript Error Steamroller.
*   [Sarcasm (‚≠ê119)](https://github.com/komlev/sarcasm) - Sarcasm is easy-as-pie, batteries-included, non-opinionated, simple-to-get-started, lightweight, reliable, convenient, dead simple, user friendly, super-sonic, hipercharged, kick-ass JavaScript library on steroids.
*   [Batonnet.js (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/BinaryBrain/Batonnet.js) - Universal, intercultural and user-friendly way to display numbers.

### SaaS

*   [Fuck off as a Service (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/tomdionysus/foaas) - Provides a modern, RESTful, scalable solution to the common problem of telling people to fuck off.

items.title: Awesome Dev Fun Updates on Feb 13, 2017
items.content_text:
### Android

*   [Stevie Wonder Simulator](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=erseco.soft.stevie.wonder.simulator) - Feel for a moment as the great Stevie Wonder with this simulator for Android.

### Haskell

*   [hackertyper (‚≠ê46)](https://github.com/fgaz/hackertyper) - "Hack" like a programmer in movies and games!

### JavaScript

*   [Echochamber.js (‚≠ê4.1k)](https://github.com/tessalt/echo-chamber-js) - Commenting without the comments - providing a single-sided user comments just stored in local storage.
*   [Object.toSting() (‚≠ê206)](https://github.com/teropa/to-sting) - Logs an image of Sting to the development console.

### Python

*   [PyTest-VW (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/The-Compiler/pytest-vw) - VW makes failing test cases succeed in continuous integration tools.
*   [left-pad](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/left-pad/) - Python's solution to infamous npm problem.

### Esoteric languages

*   [ArnoldC (‚≠ê6.8k)](https://github.com/lhartikk/ArnoldC) - Arnold Schwarzenegger based programming language.
*   [TrumpScript (‚≠ê7.6k)](https://github.com/samshadwell/TrumpScript) - Make Python great again.

### Browser extensions

*   [Cloud to butt (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/panicsteve/cloud-to-butt) - Chrome extension that replaces occurrences of 'the cloud' with 'my butt'.

### CLI

*   [Pong-command (‚≠ê178)](https://github.com/kurehajime/pong-command) - Pong is Not Ping.
*   [Alice (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/susisu/alice) - Alice sings when you mistakenly type al.
*   [cmprss (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/kurehajime/cmprss) - IrrvrsbleCmprssionForTxt.
